action_detail.name: chaos_bolt
action_detail.description:
Unleashes a blast of chaos, causing ${$m1*(1+$77220m1/100*$<masteryMod>)} Shadow damage.
Chaos Bolt always critically strikes. In addition, the damage is increased by your critical strike chance.$?s116858[][
Replaces Soul Fire.]

action_detail.name: conflagrate
action_detail.description:
Target enemy instantly explodes, dealing $s1 Fire damage$?s56235[ and reducing their movement speed by $s2% for $d.][.
If the target is afflicted by Immolate, their movement speed is reduced by $s2% for $17962d.]
Generates Burning Embers. Critical strikes double this effect.

action_detail.name: dark_soul
action_detail.description:
Infuses your soul with unstable power, increasing your critical strike chance by $113858s1% for $113858d.$?s56228[
|cFFFFFFFFPassive:|r Increases your critical strike chance by ${$113858m1/$56228m1}%. This effect is disabled while on cooldown.][]

action_detail.name: immolate
action_detail.description:
Burns the enemy for $s1 Fire damage and then an additional $o3 Fire damage over $d.$?s108647[
Critical strikes generate Burning Embers.][]$?s348[][
Replaces Corruption.]

action_detail.name: incinerate
action_detail.description:
Deals $s1 Fire damage to an enemy.$?s108647[
Generates Burning Embers. Critical strikes double this effect.][]

action_detail.name: rain_of_fire
action_detail.tooltip: $?$W2>0[Dealing Fire damage to nearby enemies.][$42223s1 Fire damage every $t2 sec.]
action_detail.description:
Calls down a fiery rain to burn enemies in the area of effect for ${$104233m1*8} Fire damage over $104232d.
Deals 50% additional damage if the target is immolated.

action_detail.name: shadowburn
action_detail.description:
Instantly blasts the target for ${$17877m2*(1+$77220m1*0.01)} Shadow damage. Only usable on enemies that have less than 20% health.
Restores $125882m1% of your total mana after $29341d. If the target dies within $29341d, and yields experience or honor, the caster gains a Burning Ember instead.

action_detail.name: stormlash
action_detail.description: Deals Nature damage to enemy targets.

action_detail.name: stormlash
action_detail.description: Deals Nature damage to enemy targets.

action_detail.name: tongue_lash
action_detail.description:
Lick the enemy, causing $s1 Shadow damage.$?s104315[
Master gains $s3 Demonic Fury.][]
|cFF777777(Right-Click to toggle)|r

action_detail.name: doom_bolt
action_detail.description: Sends a shadowy bolt at the enemy, causing $s1 Shadow damage. Deals $s2% additional damage to targets below 20% health.
